p: Following the comments from the reviewers, we have revised Figure 5. We now include a uniform colour scale in Figure 5B to help “identify which regions produce high and low case numbers”, and with the updated MC data set, which has been further curated to include solely confirmed and rejected MC reports, we have also updated the estimated risk per pregnancy based on confirmed cases only. With regards to Figure 5C, we would still argue that it complements Figure 5B, but we would be happy to leave it out of the manuscript if the reviewers / Editors feel it is superfluous.
